string.value: Hmm, there's a man who looks a little distraught... should I help him?

I went and spoke with Ben, and he's trying to make a special flower for his wife called the Red Dahlia. He got injured and needs someone to collect the materials for him. I agreed to help, and bring back #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k he needs to make the flower. Seems like a nice enough guy, shame he got injured, but I can get him what he wants...
I retrieved all the materials Ben needed and he'll be able to make the Red Dahlia. In return for my help, he gave me a scroll that will help me in my travels.

...Woe is me... I promised to make my wife this flower called the Red Dahlia, but I can't gather the materials-the creatures are too strong. I need someone to head out and gather them for me. It's very special flower, and I'm sure you could do it.
Excellent. Bring me back #b30 Stiff feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k and I can give you something I found that may help you...
That's unfortunate... if you run into anyone who's brave and wants to help someone in love, send them my way.
Wow! You got them all! I can't wait to see the look on my wife's face when she sees the flower. Thank you so much! As promised, I have something for you, I hope you like it!
Thanks again for all your help, the Red Dahlia turned out great!
Hard at work, I see! I'll need #b30 Stiff Feathers#k and #b3 Diamond Ore#k. You're almost there, keep going and return to me when done!
